{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
protected native void '''CheckPortalTransition'''([bool ''linked''])
== Usage == Checks if the Actor should teleport when moving through the top or bottom of a sector portal. If so, moves them to the appropriate location. Useful when creating custom movement code that is portal aware.
=== Parameters === *''linked'' - True by default. If true, this Actor will be unlinked and relinked to the world when moving through the portal.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
